Note:

_description: Four things that make a man fall from Reason, perhaps by Lydgate — one stanza rhyme royal

BodFair16.Transcription:
Wurship wommen wyne vnweldy ageMaken men to foune for lakke of ther
                    resounElde causeth dulnesse and dotageWorship causeth chaunge of
                    condiciounExcesse of wyne blyndeth discreciounAnd bookes alle that
                    Poetes wroot and raddeSeyn women moste maken men to madde
BodFair16.Attributed Title: Quatuor infatuant honor etas femina vinum (f. 195)
